My grandmother was just been the 4th confirmed #COVID19 resident at her LTC home today. Please pray for her 🙏 and #StayHome Now is NOT the time to start reopening non-essential businesses  #COVID19Ontario #COVIDCanada @fordnation @celliottability @DrFullertonMPP

Two new outbreaks of COVID-19 at LTC homes in Grey Bruce Public Health over the past three days. How is this still happening? There are *only 74* individuals with COVID-19 confirmed in Grey-Bruce— yet 3 care home outbreaks?  Ontario’s ongoing failure to test is 100% at fault.

This is not to underplay the importance of LTC and prisons.  But those processes are far along.  This is a new thing, and the potential to seed other communities with little access to advanced care resources is potentially disastrous.

At an LTC right now. Staff had three deaths overnight due to #COVID19. Fourth died this morning. Her nurse, who has been working doubles broke down crying. 5 mins later had to get up and go take care of the deceased.  This is not ok. #LTCinCrisis
